title: LF team gold to plat. Current G5 on main (ADC player)
body: Hi I'm bbyagami looking for a team to play with just to be a bit more competitive and actually able to work on my play. I am maining ADC at this current time in Gold V, 48 lp and I have a second account at Gold 3, 0 lp. If you are interested in talking to me or trying me out please add me (bbyagami) (OCE only)
